00006 FSMEnemyAIControl::FSMEnemyAIControl(Locust* enemy)
00007 {
00008         m_enemy = enemy;
00009         m_enemy_machine = new FSMEnemyMachine(FSM_MACH_ENEMY);
00010         StateIdle* idle = new StateIdle();
00011         m_enemy_machine->AddState(idle);
00012         m_enemy_machine->AddState(new StateAttack());
00013         m_enemy_machine->AddState(new StateDead());
00014         m_enemy_machine->SetDefaultState(idle);
00015 }

00017 void FSMEnemyAIControl::Update(int t)
00018 {
00019         if(!m_enemy)
00020         {
00021                 m_enemy_machine->Reset();
00022                 return;
00023         }
00024

00029 void FSMEnemyAIControl::UpdatePerceptions(int t)
00030 {
00031         m_nearestBee = NULL; //Game.getClosestGameObj(m_bee,GameObj::OBJ_ENEMY)
00032         
00033         //bee collision determination
00034         m_willCollide = false;
00035 
00036         if(m_willCollide)
00037                 m_safetyRadius = 30.0f;
00038         else
00039                 m_safetyRadius = 15.0f;
00040 
00041         if(m_nearestBee)
00042         {
00043                 float speed = 0; //m_enemy->m_velocity.Norm
00044                 m_nearestBeeDist = 0; //m_nearestBee->m_position.Distance(m_enemy->m_poistion)
00045 
00046                 float dotVel;
00047                 NiPoint3 normDelta(0,0,0); //m_nearestBee->m_position - m_enemy->m_position;
00048                 normDelta.Unitize(); //I am guessing this means Normalize???
00049 
00050                 float beeSpeed = 0; //m_nearestEnemy->m_velocity.Norm()
00051 
00052                 if(speed > beeSpeed)
00053                         dotVel = 0; //DOT(m_enemy->UnitVectorVelocity(),normDelta);
00054                 else
00055                 {
00056                         speed = beeSpeed;
00057                         dotVel = 0; //DOT(m_nearestEnemy->UnitVectorVelocity(),normDelta);
00058 
00059                 }
00060                 float speedAdj = 0; //LERP(speed/AI_MAX_SPEED,0.0f,50.0f)*dotVel
00061                 float adjSafetyRadius = 0; //m_safetyRadius + speedAdj + m_nearestEnemy->m_size
00062 
00063                 if(m_nearestBeeDist <= adjSafetyRadius && dotVel > 0)
00064                         m_willCollide = true;
00065         }
